original_title: Natacha Atlas: The Pop Rose of Cairo
overview: Blending live concert performances, behind-the-scenes footage and revealing interviews, director Fleur Albert's documentary offers a compelling portrait of Anglo-Egyptian pop singer Natacha Atlas. Known for fusing Western electronica with the sounds of North Africa and the Arabian Peninsula, Atlas has been one of international pop music's biggest stars, using her art to engender open-mindedness, tolerance and equality.
title: Natacha Atlas: The Pop Rose of Cairo
